reviewText: I love the story and the picture is very clear but on the middle and last disk some times the subtitles are wonky and you have to stop and think a second to figure out what they are saying. That a side I'm not sorry that I bought these dvds. If worst comes to worse I can get some translations from another web site (that everyone goes to - hint, hint, wink, wink).  The company I got the dvd set from was great.
